channel.title: [317] I want to create my home over a open water area...help pleasee
channel.description:
I am wanting to create a home for my server over an open water area,
i was wondering if anyone could explain the process because i have tried the makeGlobalObject but i want to spawn a floor of some sort so i can being placing objects on it,
can anyone help pleaseee
4NT
